Sergio Marchionne has said he aims to get to 51 percent of Chrysler before the end of this year. There was an overreaction to Sergio Marchionne 's comments, which shows how fragile the Italian economic system is, said Turin Mayor Sergio Chiamparino , with whom Sergio Marchionne regularly plays cards.`` I told Sergio Marchionne he should better explain his business model, which represents a revolution for the Italian culture.''-- With assistance from

There are no egos, nobody cares who's shooting the ball, who has the name, who's the All-Star. It's all about one common goal: bringing a championship to Philadelphia. And Allen Iverson is the biggest reason why, despite his latest controversy. It inspired economists Salvatore Modica and Aldo Rustichini to pontificate thus: A subject is certain of something when he knows that thing; he is uncertain when he does not know it, but he knows he does not... he is unaware of something when he does not know it, and he does not know he does not know. a fictitious substance called`` red mercury'' that, according to local lore, can be found in the throats of ancient mummies. Some people think it has magical powers and can be used to summon spirits. They live thinking about it. They could kill each other to get it, Zahi Hawass said.`` When I enter any place in Egypt, people ask me all the time about this.''
